data.name: ParseNumerics
data.value: Convert the cell data type to a numeric one.

data.name: CutNames
data.value: In the development...

data.name: HighlightDuplicates
data.value: Paint groups of duplicates with different colors.

data.name: ToggleCase
data.value: Change the case of all words in the cell. Replacement order: lowercase, uppercase, first capital, lowercase...

data.name: TrimSpaces
data.value: Trim or remove spaces, tabs and 'new line' symbols.

data.name: UnmergeCells
data.value: Split merged cells and fill each cell with original content.

data.name: FindErrors
data.value: Find all cells in the specified range that have any errors (#).

data.name: CopyAsMarkdown
data.value: Save the selected range of values to the clipboard using Markdown markup.

data.name: Transliterate
data.value: Change the Russian alphabet to English using transliteration, for example: 'У' - > 'U'.

data.name: TransliterateButton
data.value: Full using transliteration (by default) or partial replacement of the Russian alphabet (by analogy) with English. Example of transliteration: 'У' - > 'U', example of substitution by analogy:' У ' - > 'Y'.

data.name: ReplaceChars
data.value: Change similar letters of the Russian and English alphabets, for example: 'У' - > 'Y'.

data.name: StringifyNumericsButton
data.value: Rewrite the numeric value of the cell with words. The default is the Russian language. Allows rewriting values in range -999 billion to 999 billion, with precision up to thousandths.

data.name: StringifyNumericsEn
data.value: Rewrite the numeric value of a cell in English with words.

data.name: StringifyNumericsRu
data.value: Rewrite the numeric value of a cell in Russian with words.

data.name: ValidateValuesButton
data.value: Checking values against standards selected with drop down.

data.name: StringifyNumericsFr
data.value: Rewrite the numeric value of a cell in French with words.

data.name: UndoLastAction
data.value: Undo the latest action done with this add-in. The undo is possible for certain functions in the sections 'Converting Values' and 'Formatting Values' and only in case the cells' values have not been changed after that action.

data.name: RemoveAllSpaces
data.value: Remove all spaces in selected cells or entire sheet

data.name: TrimExtraSpaces
data.value: Trim extra spaces in cell values. Remove all trailing spaces, replace duplicated spaces in the middle of cell values.

data.name: RepairConditionalFormat
data.value: Fill conditional formatting in entire table, with rules based on first table row

data.name: ProtectUnprotectWorksheets
data.value: Set or remove Worksheets protection for current Workbook

data.name: UnprotectWorkbook
data.value: Unprotect Workbook file

data.name: CurrencyExchangeRatesSelect
data.value: Select A Currency Exchange Rate From An Online Source And Paste Into The Current Cell

data.name: CreateSampleXml
data.value: Create Sample XML based on XSD-file

data.name: SwitchReferenceStyle
data.value: Switch Formula Reference Style (A1/R1C1)

data.name: ToggleSheetLabels
data.value: Show or hide worksheet tabs
